1: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, a d'ayach tzin col in b'a, mocab' in can d'a q'uixvelal uuj.</t>
2: <t>Colin, colinel d'a yol sc'ab' eb' ajc'ool yajoch d'ayin, yujto tojol ach. Ab' val tas svala', tzin a colani.</t>
3: <t>Ochan̈ ven̈uloc icha junoc n̈aq'ueen b'aj syal in colan in b'a. Ala' to tzin colchaji yujto icha in cuartel aji, icha in n̈aq'ueen aji.</t>
4: <t>Ach in Diosal, colinel d'a eb' chuc, d'a eb' milumcham anima yed' d'a eb' ixtum anima.</t>
5: <t>Mamin Jehová Vajalil, toxonton yip ach in c'ool yictax d'a in quelemal.</t>
6: <t>Yictax ix in alji d'a ix in nun, a d'ayach svic' vip. A ach ix in ac' aljoc. Ol ach in b'itejn̈ej.</t>
7: <t>Tzijtum mach sat sc'ol yilan tas tzin ic'ani, palta ach in Diosal, an̈ej d'ayach tzin col in b'a.</t>
8: <t>Masanil tiempo, sval vach' lolonel d'ayach yuj snivanil elc'ochi.</t>
9: <t>Man̈ in a patiquejeli, yujto icham vinaquinxo. Man̈ in actejcani yujto man̈xalaj vip.</t>
10: <t>A eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin sgana in smilanchamoc, smol yetb'eyum eb', slajtian sb'a eb' d'a in patic.</t>
11: <t>Syalan eb': Pechec, yamec. Man̈xo ayococh Dios yed'oc, man̈xalaj mach ol colanel ticnaic, xchi eb'.</t>
12: <t>Ach in Diosal, man̈ najatoc tzach el d'a in tz'ey. Cotan̈ d'a elan̈chamel, ochan̈ ved'oc.</t>
13: <t>A eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin, chamocab' eb' yuj q'uixvelal. A eb' tz'alan tas chuc d'a in patic yic tzin yixtan eb' yalani, malajocab' tz'ajcan yelc'och eb'.</t>
14: <t>Palta, a inxo tic ach in Diosal, ayachn̈ej och yipoc in c'ol d'a junjun rato. Ol ach in b'itej yed' in tzalajc'olal.</t>
15: <t>Masanil tiempo ol valel yab'ixal a tojolal yed' a colval, vach'chom max nachaj vuuj smasanil.</t>
16: <t>Mamin Jehová Cajalil, a juntzan̈ tastac te satub'tac ix a c'ulej, a' ol in b'itej. Ol valel ab'ixal to a achn̈ej tojol ach.</t>
17: <t>Ach in Diosal, yictax in quelemal, ix in a c'ayb'ani. An̈ejtona' valanel juntzan̈ tastac nivac b'ob'ilcan uuj ticnaic.</t>
18: <t>Ach in Diosal, vach'chom icham inxo, sacxo xil in jolom, palta man̈ in actejcani yic ol yal valanel yab'ixal a poder d'a eb' toto ol aljoc.</t>
19: <t>Ach in Diosal, yelxo val te nivan a tojolal icha snajatil satchaan̈. Nivan tastac ix a c'ulej. Malaj junoc mach icha ach tic.</t>
20: <t>Vach'chom tzijtum tas ix in ic'ani yed' yaelal ix ac' d'ayin, palta ol in ac'xi pitzvoc. Ol in ic'xiq'ueta d'a sjulal lum luum.</t>
21: <t>Te nivan ol aj velc'och uuj, ol ac'anpax snivanil in c'ool.</t>
22: <t>A inxo tic, ol ach in b'itej yujto tzaq'uelc'och tas tzala'. Ol vac'an yuj diosal d'ayach yed' te' arpa yed' te' chin̈b'il. Ach in Diosal, co Diosal ach a on̈ aj israel on̈ tic.</t>
23: <t>Ol ach in b'itej d'a tzalajc'olal, yujto ix in a colo'.</t>
24: <t>Ol valel a tojolal d'a masanil q'uinal. A eb' ix nib'an to ay tas ix in ic'ani, ix telvi eb', ix te q'uixvicanel eb'.</t>
